text: Poster paint is a distemper paint that usually uses a type of gum-water or glue size as its binder. It either comes in large bottles or jars or in a powdered form. It is normally a cheap paint used in school art classes. ==See also== * Gouache ==References== * Ralph Mayer, The Artist's Handbook of Materials and Techniques, page 231 Category:Paints Category:Early childhood education in the United States Category:Children's art
title: Poster paint
